\index{poski\-\_\-\-Duplicate\-String@{poski\-\_\-\-Duplicate\-String}!poski_Malloc.c@{poski\-\_\-\-Malloc.\-c}}
\subsubsection[{poski\-\_\-\-Duplicate\-String}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}char$\ast$ {\bf poski\-\_\-\-Duplicate\-String} (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{const char $\ast$}]{s}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{poski__Malloc_8c_aea6f00b038c1cbab4ed20ce66fc4ae26}

\begin{DoxyParams}[1]{Parameters}
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em s} & String to duplicate.\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
A pointer to a newly allocated buffer containing a copy of the input string, s. If s == N\-U\-L\-L, returns N\-U\-L\-L. If an error occurs, returns N\-U\-L\-L but does not call the error handler. 
\end{DoxyReturn}
